msg.home.subtitle: Join EggMC, create with thousands of players, and experience unprecedented gaming fun
msg.announcement.title: Announcements
msg.server-status.title: Server Status
msg.ras.title: Rules and Features
msg.ras.card.0.title: Basic Rules
msg.ras.card.0.description: Use of any cheating clients or mods, malicious attacks on the server, or exploitation of game bugs is strictly prohibited. Violators will face penalties ranging from gameplay suspension to account banning based on severity.
msg.ras.card.1.title: Chat Guidelines
msg.ras.card.1.description: Advertising, phishing links, or illegal content in public chat channels is prohibited. Personal attacks, insults, discrimination, and other uncivilized behavior are not allowed. Violators will be muted.
msg.ras.card.2.title: Territory System
msg.ras.card.2.description: The server features a comprehensive territory protection system. Players can claim territory with a wooden hoe. Items and structures within territories are protected from damage by other players. Territory claiming is free.
msg.ras.card.3.title: Economy System
msg.ras.card.3.description: The server uses gold coins as the primary currency. Earn coins by completing tasks, participating in events, or daily online activity. Players can trade freely or purchase items from system shops. Real-money trading (RMT) is prohibited.
msg.ras.card.4.title: Reporting and Help
msg.ras.card.4.description: Use the /report command to report uncivilized behavior or cheaters. Admins will respond promptly. For assistance, use /help or contact admins in the QQ group.
msg.ras.card.5.title: Event Schedule
msg.ras.card.5.description: The server hosts weekly events including building contests, PVP tournaments, treasure hunts, and more. Participate to earn generous rewards. Follow announcements and QQ group updates to never miss an event!
msg.hardware.title: Hardware Configuration
msg.hardware.card.0.subtitle: Processor
msg.hardware.card.0.title: Intel Core i3-13100F​ ⚡4.5Ghz⚡
msg.hardware.card.0.description: Powered by a 13th Gen high-performance 4-core/8-thread CPU with single-core turbo up to 4.5GHz
msg.hardware.card.1.subtitle: Memory
msg.hardware.card.1.title: 16GB 3200MHz
msg.hardware.card.1.description: Large-capacity high-speed RAM ensures sufficient resources for fast map loading and supports more concurrent players
msg.hardware.card.2.subtitle: Storage
msg.hardware.card.2.title: High-Speed SSD
msg.hardware.card.2.description: Enterprise-grade SSD provides rapid chunk loading, world save access, and player data retrieval while ensuring stable and secure storage
msg.hardware.card.3.subtitle: Network
msg.hardware.card.3.title: Premium Multi-Line Network
msg.hardware.card.3.description: Multi-line backbone architecture with intelligent routing optimization provides reliable low-latency connections for players across regions

msg.team.card.1.description: Responsible for maintaining server order and resolving player disputes. Possesses extensive server management experience and is a friendly problem-solving expert
msg.team.card.2.description: Responsible for maintaining server order and resolving player disputes. Possesses extensive server management experience
